Subject: Deploy Netwrix Endpoint Manager on Jamf [MDM]
Description: Hello, We would need to deploy the agent and was looking at the article. It say, in the article, customers should submit a support ticket through the portal to get the script. Could someone assist us in this? Link: https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EndpointProtector_5.9.4.2/page/Content/EndpointProtector/Install/Agent/JAMF/ScriptandPackage.htm Best, Kerem
What_We_Know__c:
2025.05.27: Asked a regarding device rights.
2025.05.21: Customer asked for the scripts mentioned in the JAMF guide.
Next_Steps__c:
2025.05.27: Shared how to set specific device rights.
2025.05.21: Shared the available scripts.
Solution_Comment__c: Support provided the customer with the required pre-install and post-install Jamf deployment scripts for Netwrix Endpoint Protector agent installation. Guidance was also given for deploying the agent on Ubuntu Linux systems, including download links and configuration steps. The support team clarified when Deep Packet Inspection and VPN settings are required and explained how to manage device or user exclusions from device control policies. All customer questions were addressed, and the customer confirmed the issue was resolved and the ticket could be closed.
